channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for UT

item.title: Report X-2024010556
item.description:
Report X-2024010556

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-26T15:11:09+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-06
  • City: SALT LAKE CITY
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: WEARING FULL PPE AND FOLLOWING DECISION TREE, RESPONDER RESPONDED TO TRAILER, PLACED PACKAGE IN LINED SPILL TRAY AND RETURNED TO PROCESSING CENTER FOR FURTHER PROCESSING. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED THAT THE INTERNAL BOXES WERE MARKED WITH CORROSIVE PICTOGRAM. THE LABEL SAID THE PRODUCT CONTAINED PHOSPHORIC ACID. IT TESTED AS A 0 ON THE PH SCALE. THERE WERE NO MARKINGS OF ANY KIND ON THE OUTER BOX. UNDECLARED HAZMAT DISCOVERED. HMSC CONFIRMED. UNDECLARED PROTOCOL WAS FOLLOWED.

item.title: Report E-2024010424
item.description:
Report E-2024010424

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-25T15:11:44+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-16
  • City: WEST VALLEY CITY
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R&L CARRIERS SHARED SERVICES, L.L.C.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On January 16, 2024, one (1) 275-gallon tote of UN3266 was failing near the valve and leaked approximately less than one (<1) gallon of product to the loading dock floor. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from EnviroServe (ES) to remediate the impacted site. ES personnel utilized hand tools and absorbents to remediate the UN3266-impacted loading dock to the extent practicable. Crews transferred the remaining product from the damaged tote to a new one. The damaged tote and all impacted debris were collected and containerized into one (1) 55-gallon drum and one (1) 35-gallon drum for transport and disposal.
